title: Which regiment fought in the Kargil War? - Quora
tags: Military History and Wars of India

response.answer_text: These units took part in the war serving under various formations: 4 Field Regiment (now 4 Medium Regiment) (Self Propelled) (South Indian Classes) 15 Field Regiment (now 15 Medium Regiment) (Dogras) 41 Field Regiment (now 41 Medium Regiment) source by google
